HomePage.title: Welcome to Next.js with Internationalization
HomePage.description: This is a demonstration of Next.js internationalization using next-intl. You can switch between different languages using the language selector in the top right corner.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.content: We are a team dedicated to creating amazing multilingual web experiences. Our application demonstrates how to implement internationalization in Next.js applications using the next-intl library.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our diverse team speaks multiple languages and understands the importance of creating inclusive web experiences for users around the world.
